name: The Great Autumnus
description:
You play as the personification of Autumn, The Great Autumnus. Your mission is to wreak havoc at the cellular level of plants by reducing their green pigment, thus forcing the arrival of Autumn. To do this, you will need to defeat all plant cells in sight... 

  • The green pigment inside plant cells is called chlorophyll, and begins to break down during the fall.
  • Careful! Plant cells will divide themselves, increasing in numbers exponentially.
  • Cells are pacific but will retaliate when attacked.

Controls:

Development:

  • All assets, except audio and font, created by us using Unity and Blender.
